description:
Stay connected with your friends—anytime, anywhere with Yahoo Messenger.† Send free international text messages.††† Or share photos and videos with your Messenger contacts in real-time. 

Smart features include: 
• Voice and Video: Make free voice and video calls to your Yahoo Messenger contacts†† 
• Multitasking: A notification alerts you when an IM arrives, even when the app is running in the background 
• Send free international SMS messages: Text your friends in the USA, Philippines, Vietnam, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Canada, Pakistan, Kuwait and Thailand ††† 
• Show and tell: Capture and share photos and video in real-time 

† Requires iOS 6.0 or higher 
†† Video is available for the iPhone & iPod touch 
††† Recipients of SMS may be charged by their carriers 

Yahoo does not offer communication services in Switzerland. In order to use the Messenger App you need to register a Yahoo account in a foreign country. You are subject to the applicable terms of service and governing law.
trackCensoredName: Yahoo Messenger - free SMS, video & voice calls

releaseNotes:
• Security enhancements
